TopicTitle: Beginner's Guide to Orbit, and how to get there. With follow-along ship build.

Articles.Content: If you're new to the game and are having trouble figuring out why going straight up isn't getting you to orbit, or your ships always are running out of fuel just as you get out of the atmosphere, the come follow along as I explain the basics of orbit and show you a simple ship you can at the same time. You'll be touring the Mun and Minmus in no time.
